name: LearnerScript View Report
description: Learner Script Navigation in View Report Page

steps.title: View Report
steps.content: Click here to view your report.

steps.title: Design Report
steps.content: Click here to configure and customize the report.

steps.title: Permissions
steps.content: Click here to define permissions of a report to individual roles.

steps.title: Edit
steps.content: You can edit your report here

steps.title: Schedule Reports
steps.content: Click here to schedule the report according to the roles.

steps.title: Add Graphs
steps.content: Click here to configure the chart or graph type and allows the user to customize and configure the axis for the chart.

steps.title: Switch To Other Report
steps.content: Click here and select the report from the list of drop-down.Then it redirects that report page.
